FM2

Introduction

Closely related to the FM2+ socket, uses the DDR3 memory standard.

Key Facts & Figures

Microarchitecture:

Bulldozer

Process nodes:

GlobalFoundries 32nm or 28nm

Core counts:

2, 4, 6 or 8 (no SMT)

Native FSB:

200 MHz

Chipsets:

AMD A55, A85X

Release Year:

2012

Benching It

TBA
